msbt.message: So, my dear, there's something I must talk to you about.You remember when I told you I was moving away from the island? WellI've changed my mind. I spoke to , and they convinced me to stayThey were VERY persuasive, you see, and I simply couldn't say no. So, it seems you're not rid of me just yet!

So darling, funny story Remember when I got that wild hair to move away from the island? Yes, well, I'm not going to do that. I have changed my mind! Or rather, changed it. They practically BEGGED me to stay! What could I do?Anyhoo, you should count yourself lucky! You get to continue enjoying my company, after all!

, darling! Do you remember that silly business I mentioned about moving away? Well, I'm not moving after all.After we talked, I had a little chat with and they told me they didn't want me to go! They're such a dear, I simply couldn't stand the thought of disappointing them. Sorry for the fuss. Let's just forget that conversation ever happened, shall we?

An update for you, darling All that business about me moving away? You can forget about that! After we talked, I had a good long think. And do you know what I realized?I realized that is my home!I also realized that moving is a great deal of work and might cut into my beauty rest. But, I digress I'm sorry I caused all that turmoil. Now, let's just get back to being chums, shall we?
